item.title: Why Is Devon Energy Stock Rising Pre-Market?
item.description: According to TheFly, UBS upgraded Devon Energy to ‘Buy’ from ‘Neutral’ and raised the price target on the stock to $46 from $40.

item.title: China Mulls Up To $70 Billion Chip Incentives Amid Growing US Rivalry: Report
item.description: The Chinese government is considering a package of subsidies and other incentives to boost domestic capabilities.

item.title: Has Roblox’s Viral Growth Faded? JPMorgan Sees Rough Waters Ahead
item.description: JPMorgan downgraded the stock to ‘Neutral’ from ‘Overweight’ and slashed the price target to $100 from $145.
